data.title: Steve Lavin (businessman)
data.text:
American businessman (1932â€“2023)

Steven H. Lavin (born 1954 or 1955) is an American billionaire businessman, and the chairman of OSI Group, a US meat processor and the main hamburger supplier to McDonald's. As of August 2024, Forbes estimated his net worth at US$3.9 billion.[1]

Early life

[edit]

He is the son of Sheldon Lavin, who was the owner, chief executive officer (CEO) and chairman of OSI Group.[1] Lavin earned a BS in accountancy from the University of Illinois in 1977, and a JD from Loyola University Chicago School of Law in 1980.[2]

Career

[edit]

Lavin trained as a lawyer, and was president of Lavin & Gedville.[2] In 2023, he became chairman of OSI Group after his father, Sheldon Lavin.[1]

Personal life

[edit]

Lavin lives in Chicago, Illinois, US.[1] He is married to Dawn.[3][4]
